participant_1.background:
I value my independence and am looking for a partner who will respect that.
i like reading mystery novels.
i am a night owl , but i am an introvert so i do not go out much or anything.
I play video games to explore my artistic side and get a little bit of a thrill.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.

participant_2.background:
I work hard and save money for my future.
I will miss my parents a lot since they moved to Florida.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.
i wish i could live in a fantasy world.
I'm not really close to my family, but I love my pet dogs.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's great to hear! I'm doing well too, thanks.
I'm glad to hear that. What do you do for fun?
I like to read mystery novels, play video games, and work on my farm.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to read fantasy novels and play video games as well. I also love animals, so I have a few pet dogs.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have a few pet chickens on my farm.
Chickens are so cute! I love their little feathers.
Me too! They're very friendly and they love to eat.
What do you like to do on your farm?
I like to grow vegetables and fruits, and I also raise chickens.
That sounds like a lot of work, but it's also very rewarding.
It is, but it's also a lot of fun. I love getting my hands dirty and working outside.
I can see why you'd enjoy that. It sounds like you have a great life
